nio/AlphaDisplay.description: The AlphaDisplay block will display a character string onto the display of the RainbowHat.

words.title: Words to Screen
words.description: String, can only display four characters at a time.

nio/Buzzer.description: The Buzzer block will play a sound at a specified frequency and duration.

duration.title: Note Duration (s)
duration.description: The time in seconds for the note to play.

frequency.title: Note Freuquency (Hz)
frequency.description: The frequency in Hz of the note.

nio/FloatDisplay.description: The FloatDisplay block will display a float onto the display of the RainbowHat.

numbers.title: Numbers to Screen
numbers.description: Float, can only display four numbers at a time.

nio/LedStrip.description: The LedStrip block will control the 7 leds of the RainbowHat.

pixelrgb0.title: pixel 0 r g b
pixelrgb0.description: Red, Green, Blue value to display on pixel 0.

pixelrgb1.title: pixel 1 r g b
pixelrgb1.description: Red, Green, Blue value to display on pixel 1.

pixelrgb2.title: pixel 2 r g b
pixelrgb2.description: Red, Green, Blue value to display on pixel 2.

pixelrgb3.title: pixel 3 r g b
pixelrgb3.description: Red, Green, Blue value to display on pixel 3.

pixelrgb4.title: pixel 4 r g b
pixelrgb4.description: Red, Green, Blue value to display on pixel 4.

pixelrgb5.title: pixel 5 r g b
pixelrgb5.description: Red, Green, Blue value to display on pixel 5.

pixelrgb6.title: pixel 6 r g b
pixelrgb6.description: Red, Green, Blue value to display on pixel 6.

nio/TemperatureSensor.description: The TemperatureSensor block will notify a signal containing the temperature and pressure of the RainbowHat.
